channel.title: [Over/Closed]Online Tour of The Day: NuBia's Website (Progess)
channel.description:
NuBia website tour is now over, maybe you can see next time ;). Next time will be bigger then ever though, so dont be sad :). Will a moderator please close this thread btw? Thx
Hi Hi, Yeah I coded the site but its not done 100% cuz I have to edit so much. One of my m8s who will be helping me code this site is 18 yrs old and he knows a load of website coding languages so heh. Its not functional, some parts of missing most links dont work but about 3 or 4 pages work. Hope you see this! Link will be removed before I go to sleep for personal reasons, dont comment about copyright or anything, just r8. Thanks [center][iurl=#]Tour NuBia![/iurl][/center] Like I said before, dont comment about copyright we know that and so does everyone else who make private servers. Right, rate me right or prepare to fight the dikes in the back of my car. OK? Alright.

item.title: [Over/Closed]Online Tour of The Day: NuBia's Website (Progess)
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Dude, I read a article like 3 months ago about how google rank websites. And a saw a lot of website that buy websites based on the population it has…

Like they dont just buy the template, its like saying if someone wanted to buy www.runescape.com/ that wut I mean, they buy the game along with it too which total out to be a lot.

And popularity of a whole website is based on links, why you think people be using those wierd ad links that go to advertised pages like ebay items and stuff. Its pretty obvious, I do know wut im talking bout. I even talked to a SEO bout it. And if your the type of person who blogs you would know that posting links a lot on your website is a must because those are ways to get people to click adsenses so they profit - its kind of a way to say to someone like “Hey click this link for a special offer” but he doesnt tell them when he clicks it he gets paid some cents for adsense… Yeah. Even the guy who owns www.gimp-tutorials.com/ told me that too, he doesnt use them for no reason when he post guides. How you think the site is so managed and still up there eh? Well I’m just not gonna say anything because a lot of people dont even do the research on this, but I seriously am happy to be proven wrong.

Theres also another reason why forums get ranked so quickly on google too, google ranks you if you have enough links on your website. W3C doesn’t have a link checker for no reason, its there for many other useful reasons.

EDIT:

And either way there has already been an exact copy of the website done(that Mikey dude who made a Runescape php template for people to download, yeah him), mines is 100% modified. No where against exact, plus my website is like 1/4 bigger then Runescape website, sized.

Read full topic
item.source: [Over/Closed]Online Tour of The Day: NuBia's Website (Progess)

item.title: [Over/Closed]Online Tour of The Day: NuBia's Website (Progess)
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Server-Unknown.Net, post:5, topic:284762”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=376347.msg2835652#msg2835652 date=1245632234]

Heh, thanks.

I’m half way done with the website heh. Me and my friend are gonna sell this website if Jagex warns us about copyright shit lol, cuz we know people will buy it just like people are trying with Dodian :).

kinda hard to sell something you released publicly already
[/quote]

the domain, host, all that would go to them. People dont usually buy website templates unless it comes with a system in it. They especially buy websites with a community; that has supporting members. I’ve seen many people just look for that. Most people who buy those full sites are entrepreneurs who have many site - they make there money off links though (cuz google rank sites depending on how much links are on it)[/quote]

thejaydawg needs to shut up if he has no idea what hes saying…

Read full topic
